languages.text: "Столица смердит святотатством — слишком многие здесь ушли прежде, чем Неумирающий того пожелал".
languages.translation_comment: Idira: "The entire palace is drenched with fear... The dragon has encircled it with its body and crushed its bones. What was true... today has become a lie."

languages.text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
languages.original_text: "Столица смердит святотатством — слишком многие здесь ушли прежде, чем Неумирающий того пожелал".

traits.locale_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
"The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
"The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
"The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
"The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

languages.text: "In der Hauptstadt stinkt es nach Sakrileg. Zu viele sind gegangen, ehe der Todlose es so wollte."
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

traits.locale_text: "In der Hauptstadt stinkt es nach Sakrileg. Zu viele sind gegangen, ehe der Todlose es so wollte."

languages.text: « La capitale empeste le sacrilège à plein nez... Trop d'âmes ont été fauchées avant que l'Immortel ne l'ait voulu. »
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

traits.locale_text: « La capitale empeste le sacrilège à plein nez... Trop d'âmes ont été fauchées avant que l'Immortel ne l'ait voulu. »

languages.text: «La capital apesta a sacrilegio. Demasiados han muerto antes de que el Inmortal lo exigiera».
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

traits.locale_text: «La capital apesta a sacrilegio. Demasiados han muerto antes de que el Inmortal lo exigiera».

languages.text: 「首都は冒涜の臭いがする。不死の者が望む前に、あまりにも多くの者が旅立ってしまった」
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

traits.locale_text: 「首都は冒涜の臭いがする。不死の者が望む前に、あまりにも多くの者が旅立ってしまった」

languages.text: “这座城市散发着充满亵渎的恶臭。有人忤逆了不死之神的旨意，带走了太多本不该离开的人。”
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

traits.locale_text: “这座城市散发着充满亵渎的恶臭。有人忤逆了不死之神的旨意，带走了太多本不该离开的人。”

languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."

languages.text: "Başkente kutsala hürmetsizliğin leş gibi kokusu hâkim. Niceleri, Ölmeyen'in arzusundan çok önce göçüp gitti."
languages.original_text: "The capital stinks of sacrilege — too many have departed before the Undying One willed it."
